#include <iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int isprime(int x)
{
	int flag=0;
	if(x==1)
		return 0;
	for (int i =2;i<=int(pow(x,0.5));i++)
	{
		if(x%i==0){
			flag=1;
			break;}
	}
	if(flag==0)
		return 1;
	return 0;
}

int sum(int x)
{
	int s=0;
	while(x)
	{
		s=s+(x%10);
		x=x/10;
	}
	return s;

}


int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int l,h;
	while(t)
	{
		cin>>l>>h;
		int ans=0;
		for (int i=l;i<=h;i++)
		{
			if(isprime(sum(i)))
				ans+=1;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
